input.sentences: my family members wore very neat colors that day .
we were all together and had a good time .
my daughter looked onto the horizon and talked about her dreams .
my brother wore his lucky necklace and brought a cup .
he also wore a crown to symbolize his birthday .
output.sentences: Everyone had gathered to see the couple off on their cruise to Finland.
Of course, there had to be the cliche pictures before loading up into the ship, always the good sport, Bill was happy to play along.
Once at sea, however, he began to take notice of another woman.
So he decided to pull out the big guns, and wore his finest white t-shirt and jewelry to hopefully draw her to him.
However, he went too far when he got drunk and found a paper crown, declaring himself to be the new king of the S.S. VanDer Beak.
